Onlyfans plus Online Store: The perfect combination to earn more

Estimated Reading Time: 1 min 57 sec

Making money is a common goal for a model, an artist, or an individual still trying to find their way on the onlyfans platform. Evidently, creating income on onlyfans can be achieved via various means, and many creators can enjoy financial freedom by utilizing any of these means.

Using a subscription-based business model, Onlyfans generates revenue and rewards its content creators with incentives for pushing out content that keeps the platform running.

However, while many content creators make quite a substantial amount on the platform, many still need to pay their due. Even then, being a content creator on such a platform gives you the tools you need to generate even more income. 

What if there is another way to earn on onlyfans rather than waiting for the platform to cut you your share of the cake? There indeed exists another way to earn on the platform, which has proven quite effective. You can be in control and expand your earnings this way, building your brand in the process. 

You may ask – What exactly is this new method, and how do you go about it? Own your online store. It’s a simple thing to do, you only need to put in the time and effort. Many content creators do not realize it but they are basically entrepreneurs. Creating content is so unique to the individual that it helps them build their brand. 

If you want to know more about this effective way to make more money using the onlyfans platform, this article is basically a guide that shows you how to do that.

Make an appointment now

Do I need an Online Store? 

If making more money is your goal, maybe even more than onlyfans offer, you should consider it. One effective way entrepreneurs expand their business and, in the end, make more money is by creating a brand that content creators already have. With this, you can easily offer, for sale, physical products by featuring them on your online store. If you already make money via onlyfans, you clearly have fans interested in what you offer. 

Equipped with an influencer status, you have a unique advantage to sell products either yours or for other brands. Using your influence, persuading your fans to patronize your business is a lot easier, thereby making more sales. Having an online store is a step in the right direction which leads to more money. 

10 Reasons why you should consider having your online store

Zero competition

Usually, in the business world, entrepreneurs face competitors at various levels, which poses problems to the business that can sometimes be hard to manage. Even then, competition can become a significant threat to one’s business if not handled carefully. You have all it takes to make money with your online store and the onlyfans platform. All these come with zero competition as you directly interact with your customers, i.e., your fans. With competition off the table, you can focus on the more important aspect of running a business. Less competition also means more money for you. 

Freedom of Operation

Using marketplaces like Amazon, Etsy, or eBay to sell stuff would require you to follow several rules, some of which might hurt your business. You can wake up to see that one of the products you sell has been deleted from the marketplace due to violating some petty rules. Alas, it might even be your best seller. Do away with the pain of restrictions when you can live by your own rules and have total freedom to operate your business as you wish. An online store will afford this luxury as you sell what you want and charge what it’s worth. More money, you say? Yes, that is certain. 

100% Profit 

How does it feel to get paid your due, all of it? That does feel good, especially if you have worked really hard for it. Onlyfans might be cutting from your full pay, but you need not worry about this as you can make even more money via an online store. Also, many marketplaces take a percentage of your profit, or you would have to lower your prices just to accommodate the numerous competitors you have on the platform. With an online store, you only need to pay for payment gateways like PayPal, and that is about it. You can pocket all the remaining difference. This translates to more money for you and more to invest in your store to grow it. 

Own your brand image 

By featuring on a platform like onlyfans, you are already a living, breathing brand of yourself. Building a brand on such a platform can give you the proper exposure to push your products out and make big sales. An online store gives you 100% control over your brand and the kind of products you want to sell. What’s more, you can customize the look and feel of your store just like a physical one. Choose a layout that suits you and select color themes that resonate best with your brand. 

Direct interaction with buyers

There is a need for interaction with said customers to create a brand that offers exactly what the customers need. What better way to have personal interactions with people online than having an onlyfans account? This reflects in the name as you will have fans that love you just for what you do and are loyal enough to subscribe to enjoy more of your content. These are the kind of customers you want for your business, as they would most likely patronize you now or in the future. By coupling your onlyfans with an online store, you can direct fans to a platform where they can buy directly from you. 

Room for experiment 

When selling things, you must experiment a couple of times before you figure out the right one that will bring in sales. However, this can be incredibly hard to do in conventional marketplaces as you are faced with many hindrances already, leaving no room for change, or you might incur losses. With your online store, you can survey your clients and get their views on the products they would most likely be willing to purchase from you. Doing this helps you circumvent the pain and trouble of selling a couple of wrong products before eventually landing the right one. 

Cut through the noise

With so many brands and individuals selling products, it is easy to get lost in the business racket, with many potential customers needing to know who to patronize. People must deal with numerous ads, cold pitching, and various sales calls. These old methods are becoming incredibly dull and mind-numbingly tedious. 

However, as an influencer yourself, you have a significant advantage. With more people gravitating towards influencer marketing, you can use your influencer status to make more money. You would have little to no need to place adverts as many people are willing to buy from you. Whether you want to push out your products or sell for other brands, having your online store where you can display these products would help. 

Access to Business Data 

In today’s technology world, the impact of data on any business cannot be overemphasized. With insights gained from analyzing the data obtained, better decisions can be made to improve the revenue generated. Although a significant amount of data exists on the internet, getting precisely what you need can be challenging, primarily if you use third-party marketplaces. However, with your online store, you get first-hand data about your business which you can use to improve your reach and sales. Also, you may not even need to analyze this data yourself, as most online stores are equipped with tools that will give you a detailed analysis of data generated by your business. 

Easier to retarget and upsell 

We mentioned earlier that having your online store gives you access to exclusive business data. With the vital information obtained from these data, you can know how well your store is doing and which customers are most likely to buy from you and which aren’t. You can tell when visitors click on your product and how long they spend on your page. Equipped with such information, you are in a better position to retarget specific customers and upsell to others. Using these business strategies, you can make more sales for your business and reach more customers. 

Customer Loyalty

One significant thing onlyfans offer content creators on the platform is customer loyalty. You get people that love your craft and what you have to offer to pay to watch you do what you do. You can channel this fanbase into doing more for you by directing them to your online store. Offer them things of value for a price and earn from there. It is undoubtedly a win-win situation. Having your online store will also help you foster personal relationships with your customers, as they can give you honest reviews about your brand, which can, in turn, help you improve. 

Make an appointment now

How to create an Online Store

In this internet age, everything has been made easy. You do not need to study computer science for years to be able to create your online store. Following a few steps, you can easily make an eye-catching store. Here is a simple guide on how to start your online store. 

Choose a niche

Choosing the right niche is the most important step you would have to take to start this business. Carefully consider several niches before making your final choice. Remember that the niche you choose should be profitable, i.e., making sales is feasible. Also, ensure you have passion for it, as this will ensure you stick with it long enough to start making a profit. You can take insight from what you already do on onlyfans and figure out niches that surround it that you can serve. For example, if you serve a fitness audience on onlyfans, you can create an online store that sells fitness tools. 

Develop a Business Plan 

It might sound like too much of a hassle; however, you must have a business plan to make the process smoother. With this business plan, you can track your business progress and ensure you meet those goals. It will give you a template to follow instead of randomly doing things. Oftentimes, businesses hit bumps on the way that can derail or even collapse the whole business. However, with a solid business plan, you can foresee these problems and plan on how to solve them. Also, it gives you insight into how you can further expand your online store and grow your business. 

Choose a brand name and create brand assets

The next step is to choose a brand name that best suits your brand. This process should be easy as you can quickly adapt your name on onlyfans and creatively wove a brand name for your store. Another way you can do this is to check out available domains on a domain name registrar like GoDaddy to see one that best suits your brand. 

After getting a brand name that works, you need to create brand assets for your brand. These include logo, color palette, packaging, etc. You can take your time with this process. Start with creating a logo that resonates with your brand image. Consider using free tools like Canva, which has many ready-made logo templates you can easily edit for your brand. However, there also exists the option of outsourcing this task to capable graphic designers on reputable freelancing sites like Fiverr or Upwork. 

Choose an E-commerce platform

To host your online store, you need to register it on an e-commerce platform. There are several e-commerce platforms available to choose from. Several features are available to help you design a great store with little to no coding experience. However, you may need to subscribe to access some of these functionalities. Choose a platform that is user-friendly, adaptable, and also affordable. To help you with this step, here are three fantastic e-commerce platforms you can consider. 

Shopify is a beginner-friendly platform that offers many capabilities for launching your online store. It is quite easy to get your store started on this platform as it features over 100 free and paid themes, which you can choose from. Its basic plan is priced at $29/month. Other plans include Shopify at $79 per month and the advanced plan at $299 per month.

Wix: Here is a platform specially created to help bring to life spectacular websites with incredible features. Luckily, it offers an online store, the Wix eCommerce, for people needing the service. With this feature, you can easily build an online store in no time and start selling. The business basic plan starts at $27 per month. 

Zyro: Build a simple, less sophisticated online store on the Zyro platform. Equipped with basic functionalities that will help you launch your business and get you going. Move some elements around, add some aesthetics, and boom, you have a functioning eCommerce store. It is the cheapest of the three, with the business plan starting at only $3.59 per month. 

Optimize your online store

Once your store is up and running, you must put some things in place to ensure it performs optimally. Optimizing the store will increase its visibility, attract more visitors, and improve the revenue generated. Consider optimizing stuff like title tags, H tags, and meta descriptions, all of which must be descriptive and showcase your product in the best light. Also, consider adding fancy images to your site to make it more visually attractive. 

You need lots of fans and followers to make this work. Our team can help you achieve this and get you on track to earning more money. Apply now to start the process of taking your account to the next level. 

In Summary

Generating more income on onlyfans is indeed possible. The good news is you can share your profits with the main platform. No cutbacks. By owning an online store, you can turn your passion into a business and use your followers on onlyfans to grow this new business of yours.
